name: The Slaughter Spectrum
summary: The Slaughter Spectrum is a five-map PK3 for Doom II and the GZDoom source port created by Bridgeburner56 in May 2019. It is a collection of slaughter maps that were influential for introducing a fresh visual style to the genre. At the 2019 Cacowards, this mapset was a runner-up, and Bridgeburner56 was named a promising newcomer.
